data.question: What is the full name of the journal where the study was published?
data.answer: Journal of the American Chemical Society

data.question: What type of frameworks does MODF-1 belong to?
What is the chemical formula of MODF-1?
What method was used for the preparation of the carboxy-terminated dendrimer?
What is the role of DMA in the synthesis of MODF-1?
data.answer: DMA acts as a solvent and ligand in the synthesis process.

data.question: What is the percentage of void volume in MODF-1?
Why have branched connectors not been used to prepare MOFs before MODF-1?
data.answer: Because their flexibility could impede crystallization and characterization by single-crystal X-ray diffraction.

data.question: What indicates the deprotonation of carboxylic acid units in MODF-1?
data.answer: The absence of υΟ-Η stretch and a shift of υCO stretch from 1690.4 cm-1 in the free carboxylic acid to 1599.0 cm-1 in MODF-1.

data.question: What structural feature of triarylamines is present in the linkers of MODF-1?
How does the structure of MODF-1 contribute to its porosity?
data.answer: The 3-D porous framework is created by linking the branched organic unit with Zn(II) ions at each of the six carboxylate termini.

data.question: What is the significance of the trigonal prismatic and octahedral building units in MODF-1?
data.answer: They rationalize the NiAs topology found in MODF-1.

data.question: What does the gas sorption isotherm of MODF-1 indicate about its porosity?
data.answer: It indicates that evacuated MODF-1 has permanent porosity.

data.question: Is MODF-1 the first reported crystalline metal−organic dendrimer framework?
Does MODF-1 maintain its open structure in the presence of guests?
Is the synthesis of MODF-1 conducted under an inert atmosphere?
Does the total mass loss of MODF-1 upon heating correspond exactly to the calculated value?
Are the isotherms of MODF-1 reversible and show no hysteresis upon desorption of sorbates from the pores?
Is the estimated surface area of MODF-1 less than 500 m2/g?
Does the preparation of the carboxy-terminated dendrimer involve the use of palladium-catalyzed amination methodology?
Is the crystal structure of MODF-1 non-porous?
